DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether tailored internet-administrated cognitive behaviour therapy (ICBT) is a feasible approach in the treatment of anxiety symptoms and comorbid depressive symptoms in older adults.
DOC.brief_title: Internet-delivered Cognitive Behaviour Therapy for Older Adults With Anxiety
DOC.criteria: Have anxiety symptoms Suicidal ideation Alcohol addiction Other major primary psychiatric disorder Ongoing psychological treatment
